description: 100 Gt C instantly added (positive pulse) to a pre-industrial atmosphere (part of the CDR-pi-pulse experiment). CO2 concentration calculated (i.e. freely evolving).
long_name: pulse addition of 100 Gt carbon to pre-industrial atmosphere
rationale: Evaluate climate and carbon cycle response of an unperturbed system to atmospheric CO2 additionl; comparison with the negative pulse response.

requirements.description: Run for a minimum of 100 years
requirements.label: 100yrs min

requirements.description: Run for a maximum of 5000 years (minimum 200 years)
requirements.label: 5000yrs max

requirements.description: Use a coupled Atmosphere-Ocean general circulation model with biogeochemistry
requirements.keywords: AOGCM, BioGeoChemistry, AOGCM-BGC, Atmosphere-Ocean General Circulation Model
requirements.label: AOGCM-BGC Configuration
